passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(3) > section > div > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(10) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > ol > li:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > ol > li:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > ol > li:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(12) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > h2:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid
